function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Off-site construction and modular construction may lead to standardization and lack of customization, increasing the risk of disease spread due to common design elements.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to lack of customization and common design elements.","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation protocols and regular disinfection schedules to minimize the risk.","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies and automated sanitation systems.","People":"Construction workers, contractors, and on-site staff.","Owner":"Construction companies and project managers."}]}
